channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+3264] Questions - New Old Spice commercial
item.description: Should your man smell like an Old Spice man?

item.title: [+2221] 4chan Sends Justin Bieber to North Korea
item.description: 4chan attempts to send Justin Bieber to North Korea, the operation is almost successful.

item.title: [+1285] What to Send the Person Who Just Pissed You Off (Vid)
item.description: The 100 greatest insults from film in one clip.

item.title: [+1259] Xbox Kinect - Fantasy vs. Reality (PIC)
item.description: That's how it's going to be, I'm afraid

item.title: [+1176] Al-Qaeda Calls Off Attack To Spare Life of Twilight Author
item.description: ONN's Terrorism Expert Omar Al-Farouq explains how Al Qaeda's love for the beloved teen vampire series prevented the death of thousands.

item.title: [+1138] Entire Star Wars "A New Hope" in MS Paint [GIF]
item.description: Extremely Epic MS Paint GIF of Star Wars a New Hope.

item.title: [+1126] RIAA Outraged by YouTube-Viacom Decision
item.description: The Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA) on Monday voiced its opposition to the recent decision in the YouTube-Viacom copyright infringement case.

item.title: [+1078] Well played Google. Well played. [image]
item.description: Google proves yet again to be the most clever of all the search engines.

item.title: [+1013] Sweet Nothings (COMIC)
item.description: Ouch.

item.title: [+822] Jon Stewart Plays Six Degrees of George W. Bush [Video]
item.description: The Fox News crowd is predictably appalled that anyone would pass some blame for the Gulf oil spill onto George W. Bush, but they were more than glad to fault Bill Clinton anytime something went awry during the Bush administration.

item.title: [+798] Blizzard making World of Warcraft free to play?
item.description: Speaking to PC Gamer at their studios in Irvine, California, World of Warcraft’s lead designer, Tom Chilton, explained that “at some point, it may not make sense for us to have a subscription fee.”

item.title: [+794] Ebert: 'I should never have said video games can't be art'
item.description: I was a fool for mentioning video games in the first place. I would never express an opinion on a movie I hadn't seen. Yet I declared as an axiom that video games can never be Art. I still believe this, but I should never have said so. Some opinions are best kept to yourself.

item.title: [+785] iPhone 4 Class Action Suit Filed Against Apple and AT&T
item.description: The first iPhone 4 class action suit against Apple and AT&T has been filed today in the United States District Court for the District of Maryland. The lawsuit focus on the antenna design problems

item.title: [+693] New Study Documents Media's Servitude To Government
item.description: An analysis by Harvard students reveals that the media shifted torture standards and even language on command.

item.title: [+665] Area Man Defender Of What He Imagines Constitution To Be
item.description: Spurred by an administration he believes to be guilty of numerous transgressions, self-described American patriot Kyle Mortensen, 47, is a vehement defender of ideas he seems to think are enshrined in the U.S. Constitution and principles that brave men have fought and died for solely in his head.

item.title: [+520] “Damaging To Culture”, Online Library Smashed By Police
item.description: There is outrage amongst sections of the online community as it is revealed that at the behest of copyright holders, a free online library has been raided by police.

item.title: [+510] Mel Gibson's Tells Oksana She Would Get "Raped By N***ers"
item.description: In one of the most explosive, racist and vile outbursts by a celebrity ever caught on tape, Mel Gibson told the mother of his love child that the way she was dressed would get her "raped by a pack of n***ers"

item.title: [+496] Fireworks + Tape + Camera + A Moron = Dumb Shit on Video
item.description: His crotch is officially a fire hazard, which just gives girls a legitimate reason to avoid it.

item.title: [+490] Pet Imperial Walker: AT-AT in the Afternoon [Vid]
item.description: Animator and filmmaker Patrick Boivin recently created his short film AT-AT Day Afternoon after a childhood dream of pet Imperial Walker.

item.title: [+484] Man Tries To Install TV With Gun, Kills Wife
item.description: As Frank Zappa once said “There is more stupidity than hydrogen in the universe, and it has a longer shelf life.” Unfortunately this moron still has some shelf life left in him.
